ISSUE.TITLE: Remove/parameterize limit on /api/user/feed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Currently one has to get all repos and then iterate over `/api/repo/:host/:owner/:name` to get general build information. This makes writing status walls like `drone-wall` very cumbersome. It would be great to have an overview over the build status in the repos listing as well.
